typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.XmiMetaData
typeDescription.description: This type stores required information for the appropiate handling of consistent XMI deserialization in the XMI reader and serialization in the XMI consumer with respect to the separate storage of annotations.

featureDescription.name: sofaIdMappings
featureDescription.description: Mappings from sofa xmi:id to the sofa name, i.e. the sofaID attribute in XMI format. A mapping has the form xmiId=sofaID.
